section.p: Your cloud's Neutron controller nodes manage the interaction between Neutron and the APIC.
The APIC API is a Python package. The APIC ML2 driver uses to the package to communicate with the APIC.
APIC ML2 is a Neutron server driver that facilitates the Neutron-APIC interface.

The APIC service agent updates the APIC with a list of host links. The host links are discovered by the APIC host agent, and inform the APIC about compute nodes that are connected and automatically configurable.
